ABB Steckel mills - Hot Flat Mills (Metalle) Kontakt Cookies Sitemap Anmeldung ABB in Deutschland Home Über uns Produkte & Leistungen Presse Karriere Messen / Events ABB Group Systemlösungen Metalle Hot Flat Mills Steckel mills Verfügbarkeit und Preis prüfen Rabatt Produkt ... Bezeichnung ... Preis ... Verfügbarkeit 0 Menge Steckel Mills Overview Ansprechpartner ABB offers complete and fully integrated electrical and automation systems for control of steckel mills. ABB offers complete and fully integrated electrical and automation systems for control of steckel mills with the target to provide fully automatic control with a minimum of operator intervention and highest performance. The solution is suitable for rolling ferrous as well as non ferrous products. An ingenious concept integrated in the 800xA system provide the operators and maintenance personnel with precise diagnostic for different coordinated operations as well as for operations of individual objects to minimize the startup time of the mill. The ABB product for steckel mills includes functions as: - Collaborative Production Management - Process modeling with pass schedule calculation - Pacing for maximizing the plant productivity - Automatic thickness and steering control - Profile and flatness control - Material tracking incl ID - Mill sequencing and coordination - Speed reference generation - Crop shear control - Automatic roll change Suche Produkte & Leistungen Seite bewerten positiv negativ Danke für Ihre Rückmeldung! positive negative Ihr Kommentar E-Mail / Kontaktinformation (optional) Abbrechen Diese Seite ABB offers complete and fully integrated electrical and automation systems for control of plate mills with the target to provide fully automatic control with a minimum of operator intervention and highest performance. An ingenious concept integrated in the 800xA system provide the operators and maintenance personnel with precise diagnostic for different coordinated operations as well as for operations of individual objects to minimize the startup time of the mill. ABB Finishing mills - Hot Flat Mills (Metalle) Kontakt Cookies Sitemap Anmeldung ABB in Deutschland Home Über uns Produkte & Leistungen Presse Karriere Messen / Events ABB Group Systemlösungen Metalle Hot Flat Mills Finishing mills Verfügbarkeit und Preis prüfen Rabatt Produkt ... Bezeichnung ... Preis ... Verfügbarkeit 0 Menge Finishing Mills Overview Ansprechpartner ABB offers complete and fully integrated electrical and automation systems for control of finishing mills. ABB offers complete and fully integrated electrical and automation systems for control of finishing mills with the target to provide fully automatic control with a minimum of operator intervention and highest performance. An ingenious concept integrated in the 800xA system provide the operators and maintenance personnel with precise diagnostic for different coordinated operations as well as for operations of individual objects to minimize the startup time of the mill. The ABB product for finishing mills includes functions as: - Collaborative Production Management - Process modeling with rolling schedule calculation - Pacing for maximizing the plant productivity - Automatic thickness and steering control - Profile and flatness control - Material tracking incl ID - Mill sequencing and coordination - Speed reference generation - Coilbox control - Crop shear control - Automatic roll change Suche Produkte & Leistungen Seite bewerten positiv negativ Danke für Ihre Rückmeldung! positive negative Ihr Kommentar E-Mail / Kontaktinformation (optional) Abbrechen Bezeichnung ... Preis ... Verfügbarkeit 0 Menge Coilers Overview Ansprechpartner ABB offers complete and fully integrated electrical and automation systems for control of coilers. ABB offers complete and fully integrated electrical and automation systems for control of coilers with the target to provide fully automatic control with a minimum of operator intervention and highest performance. The solution is suitable for coiling ferrous as well as non ferrous products. An ingenious concept integrated in the 800xA system provide the operators and maintenance personnel with precise diagnostic for different coordinated operations as well as for operations of individual objects to minimize the startup time of the mill. The ABB product for coilers includes functions as: - Collaborative Production Management - Pacing for maximizing the plant productivity - Step control of wrapper rolls to minimize strip defects at the first wraps - Precise tension control to minimize coil telescopi - Material tracking incl ID - Coiler sequencing and coordination - Speed reference generation Suche Produkte & Leistungen Seite Verfügbarkeit 0 Menge Operator Concept for Rolling Mills Overview Data Open System Ansprechpartner Operate IT is a versatile, web-enabled platform for human system interface (HSI). It offers the high level scalability and interoperability to respond to the information needs of the Metals industry. It offers : Expansible and Flexible by Real Openness, Standards (OPC, ActiveX...) Easy to configure and navigate Browser-based, multiple ways to navigate Integration of 3rd party, Video etc. Structured Concept and Architecture by Plant Explorer Functional, Location, Control Information and Diagnose Management by Aspects Objects TM Technology One Interface to Process Seamless information, Enhanced information channels Plant Diagnosis Suche Produkte & Leistungen Seite Bezeichnung ... Preis ... Verfügbarkeit 0 Menge DC rolling mill drives Overview Ansprechpartner DC drives continue to be an attractive alternative for machine suppliers. The modern DC converters is easy to operate, compact and low in maintenance. DC Drives can be used in most industrial applications as well as for the modernization of old plants. We offers the complete portfolio of three-phase DC drives - from 9 kW (12 Hp) up to 18 MW (24 000 Hp). ABB DC drives are available directly from ABB or through valued ABB Drives partners. ABB AC rolling mill drives - Hot Flat Mills (Metalle) Kontakt Cookies Sitemap Anmeldung ABB in Deutschland Home Über uns Produkte & Leistungen Presse Karriere Messen / Events ABB Group Systemlösungen Metalle Hot Flat Mills AC rolling mill drives Verfügbarkeit und Preis prüfen Rabatt Produkt ... Bezeichnung ... Preis ... Verfügbarkeit 0 Menge AC rolling mill drives Overview Ansprechpartner There are three different systems of AC drives for rolling mill main drives: High-performance DTC ( Direct Torque Control) inverters with induction motors. This type is suitable for individual mill stand drives and auxiliary drives. Medium Voltage AC Drive Series ACS 6000 Cycloconverters with synchronous motors for low-speed, reversing mill stands. With digitally controlled inverters, these sophisticated AC drive systems have a dynamic performance similar to that of DC drive systems. Communication with the RMC system is done through a serial bus. Main benefits The three types of drive system have different advantages, but they share in common: Reduced lifetime cost Reduced maintenance Robust motor Suche Produkte & Leistungen Seite bewerten Login Sign up for My ABB Sign up for a My ABB account to access some of our online services More about My ABB Sign up Welcome You are being logged in as: Go to MyABB Logout Rate this page General impression Positive Negative Your cart Learn more about shopping on ABB.com Checkout Harmonic filters CHARM Open rack passive filter solution for reducing harmonics in medium and high-voltage networks Modern electrical equipment imposes stringent demands on voltage stability and power quality. The power network can tolerate only a limited level of harmonics and other electrical disturbances. By installing passive harmonic filters in medium/high-voltage networks, several benefits can be obtained: Higher power factor, improved voltage stability and lower network losses Filtering of harmonics in the system to acceptable levels Lowering of resonance problems and amplification of electrical disturbances A “clean” network creates much less strain on equipment and lengthens its life span. This results in a lower maintenance cost and the cost for replacing worn-out equipment. ABB passive harmonic filters are the ideal solution to render medium/high-voltage networks more efficient and trouble-free. Applications Any small and large medium/high-voltage utility, and industrial installations where harmonics need to be filtered. Why ABB? Competence to support filter projects from beginning to end. During the entire course of the project, we concentrate on cooperation and dialogue with the customer, so that the best solution possible is selected and attained. Measurement and analysis of harmonic content in the grid to develop the ideal solution The most efficient solution to reduce harmonics is by choosing between different types of filter solutions Delivers complete packages including capacitors, reactors, resistors and instrument transformers Vast experience in the filtering field results in designs that provide reliable operation in all climates, from the arctic cold to tropical heat Brief performance data Models BP, HP or C Voltage 1-550 kV Power >3 Mvar Fundamental frequency 50 or 60 Hz Tuning frequency Optional Installation Indoor or outdoor Capacitors CHDB, CHDE, CHDF Reactor Air or iron core .telerik-reTable-1 { border-width: 0px; Bezeichnung ... Preis ... Verfügbarkeit 0 Menge General Overview Application Ansprechpartner ABB is the leading supplier of automation, drive and level 2 systems for Tube & Welded Pipe Rolling Mills. With the Industrial IT solutions portfolio, ABB can cover the complete scope for seamless tube and welded pipe mills, from electrical equipment, drive and motors, automation solutions and production control, through to providing a full range of professional services for the complete plant life cycle. In the tube rolling industry, ABB stands for State-of-the-art technology and cost-effectiveness as well as quality and reliability and our scope of supply can include: Basic automation Gateway system ABB HPIR-T Transmission Moisture Measurements - Moisture Measurements (Measurements) Kontakt Cookies Sitemap Anmeldung ABB in Deutschland Home Über uns Produkte & Leistungen Presse Karriere Messen / Events ABB Group Systemlösungen Papier & Zellstoff Quality Control Measurements Moisture Measurements HPIR-T Transmission Moisture Measurements Verfügbarkeit und Preis prüfen Rabatt Produkt ... Bezeichnung ... Preis ... Verfügbarkeit 0 Menge HPIR-T Transmission Moisture Measurements Overview Data Ansprechpartner HPIR simultaneously analyzes multiple wavelengths of infrared energy transmitted through the sheet to provide accurate high-speed measurement of percent moisture. The measurement is insensitive to sheet temperature, furnish variations and moisture layering. The Network Platform Service Workstation software monitors the health and performance of the HPIR sensor and provides robust diagnostics. ABB Deutschland: Archive Kontakt Cookies Sitemap Anmeldung ABB in Deutschland Home ABB Germany Products & services Careers ABB Group Archive ABB Optical Caliper helps The Chief at Glatfelter 2013-02-21 - The mill in Chillicothe, Ohio has been an active and influential community presence since 1890. Acquired by Glatfelter in April 2006, the mill now produces more than 400,000 tons/yr of specialty papers on four paper machines. From its original 5-acre site, the Chillicothe mil has grown to become a papermaking facility covering 350 acres employing 1,300 people. In addition to the four paper machines, the mill includes a woodyard, a bleached kraft pulp mill with eightbatch digesters, four boilers, a coater and converting operations.
